bug.author: zgoey
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => 3.4.1
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
There is a broken link to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/samples/dnn/caffe_googlenet.cpp>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/samples/dnn/caffe_googlenet.cpp</denchmark-link> in <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4.1/d5/de7/tutorial_dnn_googlenet.html>https://docs.opencv.org/3.4.1/d5/de7/tutorial_dnn_googlenet.html</denchmark-link> and a broken link to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/samples/dnn/yolo_object_detection.cpp>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/blob/master/samples/dnn/yolo_object_detection.cpp</denchmark-link> in <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4.1/da/d9d/tutorial_dnn_yolo.html>https://docs.opencv.org/3.4.1/da/d9d/tutorial_dnn_yolo.html</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: Unfortunately, documentation for release can't be updated (we usually don't updated already released code/documentation). Replace master to 3.4.1 in these links. Also you could try "3.4.1-dev" to see current maintenance branch.
Just confirmed that it is still broken in 3.4.1-dev! But it has been fixed in latest master, so I guess this can be closed down!

These pages (from June 5: "3.4.1-dev") should have updated links (to 3.4 branch): <denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4/d5/de7/tutorial_dnn_googlenet.html>https://docs.opencv.org/3.4/d5/de7/tutorial_dnn_googlenet.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://docs.opencv.org/3.4/da/d9d/tutorial_dnn_yolo.html>https://docs.opencv.org/3.4/da/d9d/tutorial_dnn_yolo.html</denchmark-link>
Related patches: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/11638>#11638</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/11644>#11644</denchmark-link>
